name: Artificial Spirit Division
description:
Exam season is quickly approaching, and Artificial Spirit cadet Erik may or may not have an exact plan on how to pass it. Or a partner to take the exam with. Or even much of a clue as to how his Artificial Spirit technically works.


  • Master the use of your Artificial Spirit, the Golem, by fine-tuning it with the aspects of other legendary beings.
  • Develop various Personal Focuses depending on your actions and choices, through which to channel your Spirit.
  • Take your chances in high-risk, high-reward close quarters combat, or fight to keep your safe distance from the enemy.
  • Balance your available time before the finals between training and acquiring the limited but essential healing charms.
  • Pick a wingman for the exam, and iron out the strict minimum of teamwork necessary to scrape past. Or choose your old friend and take it easy, like you've always done since you first came here.
Further updates and fixes to come.
